attributes.review: I got this app and I’ve never waited for so long. This is so dumb. Maybe speeding up the app will be better. When I opened it though cause it finally downloaded, it started playing copyrighted music and I almost go my live stream taken down. This app is really messed up dude!!

attributes.review:
this app wanted me to give my phone number and ever since, my phone has been blowing up :( on top of that, this app freezes and makes my phone freak out, plus ever since i downloaded it, my whole phone system has been slower and slower. don’t download this unless you want to completely destroy any capability your phone has. maybe lonely people should download this because with all the telemarketers, you won’t be lonely anymore
i hate this app

attributes.review: I tried to like out president again but then I realized I am mentally and physically incapable of doing that, from the start i didn’t like that orange baboon this app is glitchy and has hackers and is over all horrible I hate it so much it made me mad knowing how horrible our presidents official app is and I want Obama back😔🤡

attributes.review: When I opened up this app a gang of boomers called the “Trumpers” came through my window and started chanting “ONE OF US, ONE OF US” I’m locked in my bathroom right now.
